S04n401:1: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇāviṣkambhin suvarṇaṃ nāma romavivaram |
S04n401:3: tena ca saṃsārikena duḥkhena na bādhyante |
S04n401:6: tatra na ca te rāgeṇa bādhyante |
S04n401:13: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin suvarṇanāmaromavivare avabhāsaṃ nāma cintāmaṇiratnam |
S04n401:46: ityevaṃ te mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ saṃvegamanuvicintya yadā kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya nāmānusmaranti,
S04n401:54: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–yadā bhagavan kāraṇḍavyūhasya mahāyānasūtraratnarājasya nāmānusmaranti,
S04n401:57: sukhitāste sattvā ye kāraṇḍavyūhaṃ mahāyānasūtraratnarājaṃ śroṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S04n401:60: te idaṃ sāṃsārikaṃ duḥkhaṃ na paśyanti |
S04n401:63: na ca te khañjakubjakordhvanāsagaṇḍalamboṣṭhāśca sattvāḥ kuṣṭhinaśca santaḥ |
S04n401:64: na ca teṣāṃ kāye vyādhiḥ saṃkramate |
S04n401:71: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–yadā bhagavannidaṃ praśnamanirdiṣṭaṃ tadā devaputrāṇāmabhedyā śraddhotpannā |
S04n401:74: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin kṛṣṇānnāma romavivarādavatīrya ratnakuṇḍalo nāma romavivaraḥ |
S04n401:76: tāśca gandharvakanyā abhirūpāḥ darśanīyāḥ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā divyālaṃkāravibhūṣitaśarīrā apsarasāmiva pratispardhinyaḥ tādṛśyaḥ,
S04n401:81: na ca tāsāṃ kāye kiṃcinmānuṣīduḥkhaṃ saṃvidyate |
S04n401:89: evameva te kulaputra romavivarā agrāhyā asaṃsparśāḥ |
S04n401:90: teṣu romavivareṣu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvasteṣāṃ romavivarāṇāṃ dvādaśa varṣāṇi paribhramitaḥ,
S04n401:91: na ca tena tāni romavivarāṇi dṛṣṭāṇi |
S04n401:95: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat– yadā bhagavan samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na dṛṣṭaṃ dvādaśavarṣāṇi paribhramatā,
S04n401:96: na ca tena tāni romavivarāṇi dṛṣṭāni,
S04n401:97: asyaikaikaromavivare sthitaṃ buddhaśataṃ tenāpi na dṛṣṭam,
S04n401:100: mayāpi tasya romavivaraṃ vīkṣamāṇena parimārgayamāṇena na dṛśyate |
S04n401:104: śatasahasrabhujaḥ koṭiśatasahasranetro viśvarūpī ekādaśaśīrṣaḥ mahāyogī nirvāṇabhūmivyavasthitaḥ sucetano mahāprājñaḥ bhavottārakaḥ kulīno'nādarśī prājño nirdeśastathācchāyābhūtaḥ sarvadharmeṣu,
S04n401:105: evameva kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo na śruto na kenacid dṛśyate |
S04n401:108: acintyo'yaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prātihāryāṇi samupadarśayati |
S04n401:113: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bhagavantametadavocat–kenopāyena bhagavan paśyāmi ahamavalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam?
S04n401:114: bhagavānāha– yadi kulaputra ihaiva sahālokadhātumāgacchati mama darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya |
S04n401:119: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvaḥ kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ–kiṃ mayā pāparatena cirakālajīvikayā tenāvalokiteśvaradarśanaviprahīṇenāndhabhūtena tamonuprāptamārgasaṃprasthitena?
S04n401:120: atha sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī bodhisattvaḥ punarapi bhagavantametadavocat–katamasmin kāle bhagavannavalokiteśvara āgacchati ?
S04n401:123: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra tato romavivarādavatīrya amṛtabindurnāma romavivaraḥ,
S04n401:135: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin asminnamṛtabindau romavivare ṣaṣṭiparvatāḥ suvarṇarūpyamayāḥ |
S04n401:140: ye tasmin romavivare satatasamitaṃ nirnāditaṃ sūryaṃ dhārayati |
S04n401:141: tadyathāpi nāma sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin tasmiṃścāmṛtabindau romavivare anekāni vimānakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi ratnaparikhacitāni śobhanīyāni darśanīyāni vicitrāṇi muktāhāraśatasahasrāṇi pralambitāni |
S04n401:142: teṣu vimāneṣu bodhisattvā viśramitvā dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kurvanti |
S04n401:144: caṃkrame caṃkrame saptati saptati puṣkariṇyaḥ kecidaṣṭāṅgopetena vāriṇā paripūrṇāḥ,
S04n401:147: teṣu caṃkrameṣu manoramāḥ kalpavṛkṣāḥ lohitavarṇāḥ suvarṇarūpyapatrā divyālaṃkārapralambitā maulīkuṇḍalasragdāmapralambitā hārārdhahārapralambitāḥ keyūrapralambitāḥ |
S04n401:155: evameva sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhin tasmin romavivare īdṛśā bodhisattvā vasanti |
S04n401:159: satatakālaṃ buddhadharmasaṃghābhiprasannāḥ ekāgradharmamaitrīvihārikāḥ kṣāntisaṃbhāvitā nirvāṇacintakāḥ saṃvegamānuṣyakāḥ |
S04n401:163: īdṛśāni ca tatra kulaputra romavivare saddharmanimittāni ca dṛśyante |
S04n401:175: evaṃ ṣaṭpāramitāsāṃkathyaṃ kṛtvā svakasvakāni caṃkramaṇāni caṃkramanti |
S04n401:177: teṣu caṃkrameṣu sāmantakeṣu kalpavṛkṣā lohitadaṇḍāḥ sauvarṇarūpyapatrā divyālaṃkārapralambitāḥ maulikuṇḍalasragdāmapralambitā hārārdhahārapralambitā ratnahārapralambitāḥ |
S04n401:198: evameva kulaputra kinnarā dharmābhiratāḥ satatakālamavalokiteśvarasya nāmanusmaranti |
S04n401:201: evaṃ durlabhaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ mātāpitṛbhūtaḥ sarvasattveṣvabhayaṃdadaḥ |
S04n401:210: teṣāṃ teṣu romavivareṣu tāvattiṣṭhanti yāvannairvāṇikīṃ bhūmimanveṣante ||
